shelters.name: Happy Tails Shelter
shelters.description: A safe haven for dogs and cats looking for their forever homes.

shelters.description: A community-supported shelter for pets in need of care.

shelters.name: Paws and Claws Sanctuary
shelters.description: A no-kill shelter dedicated to finding homes for all pets.

shelters.description: A shelter focusing on the rehabilitation of rescued animals.

shelters.description: A rescue organization dedicated to giving second chances to pets in need.

shelters.description: A non-profit shelter that strives to provide a safe environment for abandoned animals.

shelters.name: Whiskers & Tails Animal Refuge
